alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 4:52PM CDT until June 26 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Southwestern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Avon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hollandale and Estill around 530 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
